mapper.insert: insert into auction_chat_message(msg, room_id, user_id, created_at) values(#{message}, #{roomId}, #{userId}, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT m.id, m.msg AS message, u.nickname, m.created_at AS createdAt FROM auction_chat_message m INNER JOIN "user" u ON m.user_id = u.id WHERE m.room_id = #{roomId} ORDER BY m.created_at ASC
mapper.insert: insert into auction_chat_room(item_id, created_at) values(#{itemId}, sysdate)
insert into auction_chat_room(created_at, user_id1, user_id2) values(sysdate, #{userId1}, #{userId2})
